title: Past, Present, and Future

vocab.definition: Time that has already happened, like yesterday or last year
Time that is happening right now, today
Time that has not happened yet, like tomorrow or next year
A line that shows events in the order they happened

teachingNotes: Use personal timelines and family photos. Discuss how things change over time. Compare old and new technologies.

sample.question: Give an example of something from the past, present, and future.
expectedAny: past: yesterday's lunch; present: today's lesson; future: tomorrow's weather
past: last year's birthday; present: this morning; future: next week's field trip
past: my baby pictures; present: my school; future: my next birthday

sample.question: What is the future?
expectedAny: time that has not happened yet
